articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower as energy stocks weigh - Reuters.com
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened lower on Thursday, weighed by a drop in energy stocks as crude prices extended losses on supply uncertainty.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
July 8 (Reuters) - Canadas main stock index opened lower on Thursday, weighed by a drop in energy stocks as crude prices extended losses on supply uncertainty.
